definition: self-respect/self-love/self-regard/regard for oneself/to cherish one's good name/to take good care of one's health
to love/to be fond of/to like/affection/to be inclined (to do sth)/to tend to (happen)
Three-Self Patriotic Movement, PRC government-sanctioned Protestant church from 1949
pinyin: San1 zi4 Ai4 guo2 Jiao4 hui4

sentences.english: It has dignity and self-love stronger than mine.
sentences.chinese: 它的尊嚴與自愛比我的更強烈。

sentences.english: The same sex, the real human self-love.
sentences.chinese: 同性愛，實質是人類的自愛。

sentences.english: Sin of self-love possesseth all mine eye.
sentences.chinese: 自愛這罪惡佔據着我的眼睛。

sentences.english: If you don't keep your nose clean, you may get a bloody nose.
sentences.chinese: 如果你不潔身自愛，名聲可能會受損。

sentences.english: Self-respect is self-recognition of a concrete and honest individual.
sentences.chinese: 自愛是對自我作爲一種具體實在的承認。
沒有哪樣東西能夠取代自愛。
適當的自愛是愛別人的動力來源。

sentences.english: Knowing self-love, one can gain other's friendship.
sentences.chinese: 懂得自愛，才能得到他人的友誼。

sentences.english: Self-love is saying no to abuse and betrayal.
sentences.chinese: 自愛是對虐待和背叛義正詞嚴的拒絕。

sentences.english: Solomon would reply that love forms a part of wisdom.
sentences.chinese: 所羅門也許會回答說愛也是自愛之一道。

sentences.english: Also, the kind of self-love that enables human beings to flourish cannot be demanded or programmed.
sentences.chinese: 此外，這種能使人類繁榮的自愛不能被要求或被策劃。

sentences.english: Self-love is the greatest of flatterers.
Know Love – ego and pride, are the opposites of Love.
sentences.chinese: 懂得自愛，應該明白自負和驕傲都是自愛的對立面。

sentences.english: Know Love – ego and pride, are the opposites of Love.
sentences.chinese: 懂得自愛，應該明白自負和驕傲都是自愛的對立面。

definition: to bother about/to haggle/to bicker/to argue/plan/stratagem
to resign oneself to adversity (idiom); to grin and bear it/to submit meekly to insults, maltreatment, humiliation etc
to move aside/to get out of the way/to back down/to concede
to cling to/to be reluctant to give up (sth)/to have a fondness for (an indulgence etc)
to put oneself in sb else's shoes (idiom)
